What do I need to do if I've previously launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this release?

If you've previously launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this release, you need to delete the following directories before running this new update:

* On Linux: `~/.komodo/vrsctest`
* On MacOS: `⁨Users⁩/⁨{YourUserName}/⁨Library⁩/⁨Application Support⁩/⁨Komodo/vrsctest`
* On Windows: `"%APPDATA%"\Komodo\VRSCTEST`

Why might some antivirus software flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP"?

Some antivirus software, such as Avast and Kaspersky, may flag the software as "not-a-virus" or "PUP" (Potentially Unwanted Program) because it is mining software, which can be installed by a third party to exploit your PC. These warnings are false positives.
